name: Crowned Heads - Headley Grange Black Lab - LE 2018
brand: Crowned Heads, Headley Grange Black Lab
additionalNotes: The Crowned Heads Headley Grange Black Lab LE 2018 was born out of the idea to create a cigar that tasted like the unforgettable drum beat lead-in to Led Zeppelin’s “When the Levee Breaks” (Headley Grange refers to an 18th century English poorhouse that was converted into a recording studio in 1960’s). Not a small feat, but the folks at Crowned Heads were up to the challenge. Described as being “big, bold, and gusty”, the Crowned Heads Headley Grange Black Lab LE 2018 features a dark, veiny USA Connecticut Habano wrapper, which covers a binder and filler made of fine Nicaraguan tobaccos. With its well-balanced flavor profile that is citrusy, peppery, and nutty, the Crowned Heads Headley Grange Black Lab LE 2018 is definitely the cigar of choice for when you want to jam out.
